settings.heading: We’d love to hear from you.
settings.subtext: Here's what some of my satisfied clients have to say about my work.

settings.heading: What is Krafti Art?
settings.row_content: Krafti Art is a brand dedicated to creating beautifully handcrafted home décor, art pieces, and lifestyle products. Each product is made with love, creativity, and traditional craftsmanship to bring warmth and uniqueness to your space.

settings.heading: Are all your products handmade?
settings.row_content: Yes! Every Krafti Art product is 100% handcrafted by skilled artisans. Slight variations in color, texture, or shape make each piece unique and add to its authentic charm.

settings.heading: Do you use eco-friendly materials?
settings.row_content: Absolutely. We focus on sustainability and use eco-friendly, locally sourced, and natural materials wherever possible to support both the planet and artisan communities.

settings.heading: How can I take care of handcrafted items?
settings.row_content: Each product comes with specific care instructions. In general, keep items away from direct sunlight, moisture, and harsh chemicals. For wooden or clay crafts, use a dry or slightly damp cloth for cleaning.

settings.heading: Can I request a custom or personalized order?
settings.row_content: Yes, we do accept custom orders! If you want something personalized—like engraved names, specific colors, or sizes—please contact us via email or our contact form. We’ll do our best to bring your vision to life.

settings.caption: Here are answers to some common questions
settings.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
